name: Stint Wick
description:
Simple Twin Stick Shooter.

Controls (Xbox One Controller):

  • Start / Hamburger Button: Pause / Un-Pause
  • Left Stick: Move
  • Right Stick: Shoot

Random Facts about Stint Wick

  • Primarily designed as a vehicle for learning OpenGL and game dev generally.
  • Only tested on my own computer / controller combo (Win 10/x64/Xbox One controller)
  • Probably super buggy!!

Source here: https://github.com/carvermichael/StintWick
